articles.title: Petrol, Diesel Prices Hiked For Third Straight Day On Friday - NDTV Profit
articles.description: In Delhi, the price of petrol was hiked by 20 paise to Rs 82.86 per litre with effect from 6 am on November 29, according to Indian Oil Corporation
articles.content:
Fuel Prices: Domestic petrol and diesel prices vary across states due to value added tax (VAT).

articles.title: SEBI rejects 63 Moons’ renewal application - Moneycontrol.com
